_comment: Vidya — Example plugin config for openclaw.json under plugins.entries.memory-lancedb-voyage.config

embedding._comment: Provider: 'voyage' (default), 'openai', or 'jina'. Get API keys at: https://dash.voyageai.com/ | https://platform.openai.com/ | https://jina.ai/

_comment_providers: Voyage AI  — Models: voyage-3-large (1024d), voyage-3 (1024d), voyage-3-lite (512d), voyage-code-3 (1024d)
_comment_llm: LLM judges whether conversation content is worth storing. Falls back to heuristic if LLM unavailable. captureLlmUrl is the base URL (without /v1/chat/completions) — the plugin appends the path automatically. captureLlmApiKey is only needed for external endpoints (e.g. "${OPENCLAW_LLM_API_KEY}"); sent as a Bearer token. Falls back to OPENCLAW_LLM_API_KEY env var. Leave empty for local gateways.
_comment_tools: Set true to enable memory_list and memory_stats tools (useful for debugging)

retrieval._comment: cross-encoder uses Voyage rerank-2 API (same API key). Set rerank to 'none' to skip reranking.

agentAccess._comment: Restrict which scopes each agent can read/write. Omit agent to grant access to all defined scopes.
